item.description: Bring those friendly dogs on our walk at the Chasm. This is always a fun meet-up. Can we talk Maria's photo group into joining us too......Looking forward to getting out with some of you and my little Terry will tag along too. Bring a snack and your camera's. See you there! Meet at the visitor's center and be on time. We leave for our hike at 10:15.

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Purgatory Chasm Dog Walk
